entities.name: he-who-must-not-be-named
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as Voldemort. He is confirmed to have returned to the country and is active once more.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: The Minister of Magic who confirms that He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named has returned.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison for dark wizards and a location where the dementors are based.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: The creatures that have revolted against the Ministry and are taking direction from He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.

relationships.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is located in Azkaban, as the dementors are taking direction from him.
He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is controlling or directing the dementors, as they are taking direction from him.
Cornelius Fudge confirmed that He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named has returned.
